## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project coding standards documented in `docs/DEVELOPMENT_WORKFLOW.md`
- [ ] I have updated or added documentation in `docs/` for any public-facing changes (features, API changes, layout changes or behavioral changes)
- [ ] I ran type-checking and linting locally (`npm run type-check`, `npm run lint`)
- [ ] I added/updated tests and they pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] I ran security scans where applicable (`snyk code test` and `snyk test`)
- [ ] I included screenshots or a short video for UI changes
